thread.title: Role Grows Even Bigger for Outsize Pitcher Bartolo Colon

title: Role Grows Even Bigger for Outsize Pitcher Bartolo Colon
text:
Published By: NYTimes Baseball - Today 
Colon, who started 31 games for the Mets in the regular season, is an important part of the bullpen thus far in the playoffs....
